title: AX Budget PC.zip
description:
Axium Budgeting for PC - includes key but needs activation patch.

This was awesome budgeting software for the film & tv industry.  The company that made it just went out of business and their software assets were bought by their mega-evil arch-rival, Entertainment Partners, whose crappy competing software costs 3x more than this did and sucked 10x more.  

Anyone who can provide an activation patch and get this out there, you&#039;re awesome.
